TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ListChangedType extends System.Enum

remarks.format:
## Remarks Used by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedEventArgs.ListChangedType%2A> property of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedEventArgs> class to indicate the way an <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList> object changes.
## Examples For an example of using this class, see [Handling DataView Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ComponentModel.ListChangedType ItemAdded = int32(1)

Docs.summary: An item added to the list. <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedEventArgs.NewIndex%2A> contains the index of the item that was added.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ComponentModel.ListChangedType ItemChanged = int32(4)

Docs.summary: An item changed in the list. <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedEventArgs.NewIndex%2A> contains the index of the item that was changed.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ComponentModel.ListChangedType ItemDeleted = int32(2)

Docs.summary: An item deleted from the list. <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedEventArgs.NewIndex%2A> contains the index of the item that was deleted.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ComponentModel.ListChangedType ItemMoved = int32(3)

Docs.summary: An item moved within the list. <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedEventArgs.OldIndex%2A> contains the previous index for the item, whereas <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedEventArgs.NewIndex%2A> contains the new index for the item.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ComponentModel.ListChangedType PropertyDescriptorAdded = int32(5)

Docs.summary: A was added, which changed the schema.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ComponentModel.ListChangedType PropertyDescriptorChanged = int32(7)

Docs.summary: A was changed, which changed the schema.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ComponentModel.ListChangedType PropertyDescriptorDeleted = int32(6)

Docs.summary: A was deleted, which changed the schema.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ComponentModel.ListChangedType Reset = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Much of the list has changed. Any listening controls should refresh all their data from the list.
